channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
Hello I have a few question I need help with also a few codes if thats ok. Thankyou
1) How do you get the staffs/some weapons to stand up straight and not on an angle?
2) The source im using has really bad magic spells is there a way I can replace them with all nw spell codes?
Thats all.
Thankyou in advanced if I can't get back to you right away.

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Legend God Of Legend
item.description:
@God_Of_Legend wrote:

Thankyou[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2008, 01:30:14 PM[/size][hr]I don’t understand this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747) { //Torag Hammers
				playerSEA = 0x814;
			}
                        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { //Whip
				playerSER = 1661;
			}
			 if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583) { // ring of stone
				npcId = 1266;
				isNpc = true;
			}

Read full topic

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

To change the walk, stand, or run emote of a weapon. search for getRunAnim, getWalkAnim, or getStandAnim. return ###; stands for the emote.

To change the magics in your server, search for case 131 or public void attackMage, case 131 represents magic on npcs, and attackMage represents for magics while in PKzones.

Read full topic
